keyChanges: Combine Information Session + Talk into single category
Focus on event format/purpose rather than subject matter

description.Information Session / Talk: Program info sessions, presentations, seminars, talks
description.Social / Mixer: Networking events, community building, social gatherings
description.Workshop: Hands-on learning experiences, skill building sessions
description.Research / Academic: Research presentations, academic discussions, scientific findings
description.Panel Discussion: Expert panels, moderated discussions, Q&A sessions

Conference.reasoning: Most are actually info sessions or talks, not full conferences

Hackathon.reasoning: More specific and includes other competitive formats

Other.evaluate: Case by case basis using revised categories

exampleRecategorizations.title: Thinking Big Science
exampleRecategorizations.reasoning: Evening networking event with structured group conversations

exampleRecategorizations.title: Dundee Activator Info Session
exampleRecategorizations.reasoning: Program information session, not a full conference

exampleRecategorizations.title: Norwich Lunch & Learn
exampleRecategorizations.reasoning: Lunchtime info session with networking over food

implementationSteps: 1. Update category definitions to use new 6-category structure
2. Re-categorize existing events using revised logic
3. Update UI to show new category names
4. Test categorization accuracy with sample events
5. Update AI categorization prompts to use new categories
